text: The men's 4x100 metres relay event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 17 and 18 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Trell Kimmons Demi Omole Ivory Williams LaShawn Merritt ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Kawayne Fisher Kevin Stewart Andre Wellington Renaldo Rose ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Naohiro Shinada Hiroyuki Noda Yuichi Shokawa Naoki Tsukahara ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !!
